data.message:
Just at first I apologize for my bad English because I use google translator.
I do not know how I start this, but Marshall for your music has helped me in front of the life, I have been bullied in school for nine years. Your music helped me to endure all that shit what I experienced, you're still with me your favorite rapper. You are my own rap career inspiration, I respect you a lot and I would sometimes see a gig in Finland. I'll post the attached Lose Yourself which has helped my own during my career a lot

Ps and HBD MY TRUE KING

Plz like my comment if u read this
